page.title: 04Ecchinswell Clubs
page.content: The village hall provides accomodation for organizations such as the Women's Institute,Youth Club and Cub Scouts,also a monthly Health Clinic for mothers and babies. The{Football Club}is a small local team that plays on the recreation ground.This is also true of the{ {Cricket Club}which plays on summer Sundays. The{Youth Club}has been temporarily suspended because of staffing and other problems. {Ecchiswell Brownies}meet in the Bishops Green village hall because the Bishops Green mothers have no transport.This is a very active group of 18 Brownies.The{Watership Cub {Scouts}has just started.The{Women's {Institute}has a small membership and is in dire need of new members to make it viable.
